<S%G3361>"Don't<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> that which is <S%G40>holy<s%> to the <S%G2965>dogs,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> throw <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3135>pearls<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G5519>pigs,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> perhaps they <S%G2662>trample<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>under<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G4762>and<s%> turn <S%G4762>and<s%> <S%G4486>tear<s%> you to <S%G5209>pieces.<s%>

<S%G154>"Ask,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it will be <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%> <S%G2212>Seek,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you will <S%G2147>find.<s%> <S%G2925>Knock,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it will be <S%G455>opened<s%> for <S%G5213>you.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> <S%G3956>you<s%> <S%G2309>desire<s%> for <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G5210>you,<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3779>shall<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G846>them;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>

<S%G3754>How<s%> <S%G2346>narrow<s%> is the <S%G4439>gate,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2346>restricted<s%> is the <S%G3598>way<s%> that <S%G520>leads<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2222>life!<s%> <S%G3641>Few<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1526>those<s%> who <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G3004>says<s%> to <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>" will <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>Heaven;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> he who <S%G4160>does<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> who is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>
